title: Platinum players are the worst players
body: Prove me wrong. I've never played with so many toxic, ungrateful, disgusting human beings who expect every single player to be challenger, and my word i am sick of it. Why are people getting away with these things? It just breeds toxicity. I want to be toxic to these people, they disgust me. Fix your game Riot.

replies.body:
the worst group in any elo bracket is around division 4.

iron 4 are basically bots who type unintelligible in what is questionably an attempt at language or maybe swearing idk.
bronze 4 flat out don't understand the game but claim to.
silver 4 are particularly aggressive, tilt easy, and have delusions of grandeur.
gold 4 either don't give a damn about ranked and will troll and are susceptible to any insult regarding their personal performance.
plat 4 have 'the' god complex.
diamond 4 tilt easy and troll often.
As opposed to a gold player who mostly play with gold players complaining about plat players? I don't think you thought this one through.

I dont think you can generalise that only plat players are toxic. its anybody in any rank tier. 

However to a degree though your right in a sense i felt when i play with plat players a few can be kinda judgmental about how you play and always pick on you for making 1 mistake and wont drop it. they will just keep bringing it up and  hold it against you all game especially if your a lower tier rank. 

i was gold 4 last season btw but dont play ranked too much anymore

if you make a mistake people should let you know where you went wrong and how you can improve rather than just jump the gun and star flaming, you would think high tier players would be reasonable and understanding as they were once in the lower tiers but it seems we wont reach that utopia anytime soon

Just emphasising this is only MY opinion and my experiences :)
